studyAmendmentImpacts.description: The study remains a Phase 3 randomized trial evaluating axicabtagene ciloleucel versus SOC in r/r DLBCL.
Updates to primary and secondary analysis methods for EFS, ORR, and OS.

studyAmendmentReasons.reasonText: To provide updated clinical data and refine statistical analysis plans based on study progression.

studyChanges.summary: Updated protocol version and date to reflect Amendment 6.

studyChanges.beforeText: Not explicitly detailed in provided snippet
studyChanges.afterText: EFS is defined as the time from randomization to the earliest date of disease progression per the Lugano Classification, commencement of new lymphoma therapy, or death from any cause.
studyChanges.summary: Defined the specific events constituting an EFS event and the use of blinded central review.

studyChanges.afterText: Rituximab + gemcitabine, dexamethasone and cisplatin/carboplatin (R-GDP) suggested dosing
studyChanges.summary: Added specific suggested dosing regimens for the Standard of Care arm.
